scripts.build: yarn workspaces foreach --all --exclude next-app run build
scripts.check:expo: yarn workspace expo-app run expo install --check
scripts.rm:nodemodule: rm -rf .yarn/cache node_modules apps/expo/node_modules apps/next/node_modules apps/next/.tamagui packages/app/node_modules packages/ui/node_modules yarn.lock
scripts.vercel:install: yarn set version berry && yarn install
scripts.web: yarn build && yarn workspace next-app run next
scripts.web:extract: DISABLE_EXTRACTION=false yarn workspace next-app run dev
